title: VERA FILES FACT CHECK: Duterte muling pinaliit ang kanyang suweldo
subtitle: Sa isang talumpati sa 6th Regional Community Defense Group sa Dingle, Iloilo noong Peb. 22, si Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte ay nagbigay ng maling halaga ng suweldo na kanyang tinatanggap.
author: www.verafiles.org
vclaim: Founded in March 2008, VERA Files is published by veteran Filipino journalists taking a deeper look into current Philippine issues. Vera is Latin for “true.”
